name: Neon City Swing-ing: Super-fly Glow-ing Rag-Doll with a Rope
name_original: Neon City Swing-ing: Super-fly Glow-ing Rag-Doll with a Rope
description:
+++Download Today so you don’t Miss Out+++

Use your ropes to swing Neon Man from one skyscraper to another. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a building to throw your rope there, touch again to release it and fly through the sky. Then land on the Target to finish the level. Lots of cool and different power ups to help you get past that tough level.

FEATURES:

• Universal app, play in HD on any iOS device, including iPads
• Tight and fast paced gameplay
• Amazing looking Neon Graphics
• Neon Man gets thrown around like a rag doll
• Share your scores on Facebook or Twitter
• Simple controls but Hard to Master.

Download Today! :) Leave a review and rating to let us know what you think. Everyone here at Flowmotion Entertainment wants to continue to deliver some of the best and most fun mobile games available. Your feed back is a big part in us being able to do this.

PS: Don't forget to visit us on facebook :) https://www.facebook.com/Flowmotionentertainment
